features.title: Google Account Login
features.message: Users can now log in using their Google account, enabling a smoother and more secure authentication experience.

features.title: Image Notifications Support
features.message: Notifications now support images, making alerts more informative and engaging.

features.title: Firebase Image Fetching
features.message: The app now fetches image data directly from Firebase Storage, improving scalability and performance.

features.title: Quiz Results Summary
features.message: Quizzes now display a detailed results screen upon completion, helping users track their progress.
